name: Astrobox
description:
A child aboard a space station has discovered all of his toys missing from his toy box and replaced with corrupted creatures resembling his playthings after the station Circinus wandered into a strange galaxy. With all the other passengers missing, he must find his lost toys, save them from corruption, and enlist their help to navigate the space station and rescue himself from the evil corrupted galaxy.

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021 with PIGSquad! The theme of the jam was Lost & Found.

Controls InputActionArrow Keys, WASD
Move Around
SpaceJumpz, mouse click
Fire weapon
